name: Shattered Moon
description:
Will you let the The Moon Vanishing ?

Shattered Moon is a simple platformer game in which you have to collect broken pieces of the moon.
  • Simple Game/hard challenge
  • Local multiplayer
  • 80+ levels and a boss fight.
  • 3 Moon Challenge
  • Infernal Mode.

Music by Remi Labroche : @kiwiManchot
Listen to the OST

All Game design - Code and Art By Goomba

Artwork by Johanna Fluzin

The games plays best with xbox controller but you can use keyboard or mouse
